adjectives.description: syncretic (comparative more syncretic, superlative most syncretic)

entries.meaning: Combining disparate elements in one system, especially as in forms of religious observance, philosophical systems, or artistic creations.
examples: In Islamic villages below Tengger, however, more syncretic communities still celebrate annual village ritual festivals (slametan desa, slametan tuyo) designed to give homage to the spirits of the mountains and insure the flow of their waters.
